DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate bioequivalence fesoterodine 4 mg tablet manufacture Vega Baja , versus Zwickau .

DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Subjects evidence history clinically significant urologic diseases A positive urine drug screen Pregnant nursing female ; female childbearing potential unwilling unable use acceptable method
